item.title: Kubernetes
item.description: Kubernetes Kubernetes is a software system that allows you to easily deploy and manage containerized applications on top of it. It relies on the features of Linux containers to run heterogenerous applications. Deploying applications through Kubernetes is always the same, whether your cluster contains only a couple of nodes or thousands of them. Kubernetes is composed of a master node and any number of worker nodes. When the developer submits a list of apps to the master node, Kubernetes deploys them to the cluster of worker nodes.
